channel.title: Need help for changing name plz
channel.description:
i juste for got how to change name on my server i use teamtorva
juste tell how to do it
vtw chec the attache file and you will see whitch name i want to change :P
ps sorry for my bad englich

item.title: Need help for changing name plz
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

LOL I said to search for it yourself if your find button is not working. If you cannot find it, then post back.
Quit being lazy and actually search. Sometimes if you aren’t searching the correct keywords it will not come up.
If you haven’t already, download Notepad++ and try searching for it in that.

item.title: Need help for changing name plz
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Friend had the same problem but all you have to do is search for it in Client.java in your server files.
If you cannot use the “find” button then I would suggest you searching yourself for it.
If you have searched everything in there and still cannot find it, try searching client.java in your client files.
One of the two has the notification message.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help for changing name plz
item.dc:creator: @ricootje2 ricootje2
item.description:
@ricootje2 wrote:

First go to Your client file, search for ‘‘Gui.java’’.
ctrl+f search for ‘’public static string frametitle,
Then you will see : ‘’public static string frametitle = ''You're Client Name''.

Now the the login ''welcome to ‘‘Teamtorva’’.
First go to ‘‘client.java’’ (in client side)
Search for Welcome to Teamtorva
Then change it to what u want.

And now the Alert message ''welcome to teamtorva.
First go to ‘‘client.java’’ (server side)
search for sendMessage("Alert##Wlecome to Teamtorva!");
Then change it to what u want.

Hope This helped
BB.

Read full topic
